last_episode_to_air.name: Masked 'merica
last_episode_to_air.overview: Veteran security guard Randall Harrison and his less than enthusiastic partner Alex attempt to bring peace and quiet to the neighborhood after responding to a string of noise complaints against a popular social media influencer who refuses to follow the rules.

name: Burb Patrol
overview: Burb Patrol follows the workplace adventures of Randall, an uncompromising by-the-book security guard and his partner Alex, an unmotivated slacker as the duo keeps the members of a gated suburban community safe against a slew of first-world problems.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Burb Patrol is a new scripted mockumentary from Schoolyard TV, that follows the daily workplace adventures of security guards Alex (Matt Rife) and Randall (Juhahn Jones).

episodes.name: The Dank Rank
episodes.overview: Veteran security guard Randall Harrison and his less than enthusiastic partner Alex, attempt to bring peace and quiet to the neighborhood after responding to a string of noise complaints against a popular social media influencer who refuses to follow the rules.

episodes.name: When Life Gives You Lemons
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex are called in to take down an unapproved black-market lemonade stand that has popped up in the neighborhood. However, the basic task takes an unexpected turn when the lemonade stand's feisty nine-year-old owner won't go down without a fight.

episodes.name: Hans in the House
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex discuss their preferred pistachio preference. They meet a foreign invader with a surprising connection to Alex. The guys then rescue an injured jogger while an out-of-control chiropractor keeps getting in the way.

episodes.name: White and Woke
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex respond to reports of vandalism occurring in the community park perpetrated by a duo of neighborhood social justice warriors who end up challenging Alex on his self-righteousness and a wokeness battle ensues much to the annoyance of Randall.

episodes.name: The Code Brown Caper
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex have to clean up the streets....literally. When one of the residents in the neighborhood is not properly cleaning up after their dog, its up to Randall and Alex to figure out who the crap culprit is and nab them before its too late.

episodes.name: Christmas in July
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex confront a resident about Christmas decorations in July and a man running an overly sexual yoga class in the park. When Dankbank gets into an argument with a neighborhood Karen on the loose, Randall and Alex are forced to play mediator.

episodes.name: English, Do You Speak It?
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex debate over the best Batman actor while attempting to solve a problem from a resident they can't understand. While looking for clues, Alex has another run- in with the neighborhood social justice warriors who again challenge his level of 'wokeness'.

episodes.name: Squatty
episodes.overview: When the guys are tasked with removing a crafty homeless man from squatting in one of the neighborhood houses, Alex is appalled at the inhumane way Randall wants to proceed but Randall's previous encounters with the man show why there may be a need for concern.

episodes.name: Karen Kombat!
episodes.overview: Randall and Alex break up an altercation between two suburban women ready to fight it out. Randall is forced to confront and shut down Dankbank's out of control party alone after Alex is called away by HR, but it gives Alex the chance to finally get some alone time with his crush.

episodes.name: Masked 'merica
episodes.overview: Veteran security guard Randall Harrison and his less than enthusiastic partner Alex attempt to bring peace and quiet to the neighborhood after responding to a string of noise complaints against a popular social media influencer who refuses to follow the rules.
